name: Arthur's Rage
description:
Arthur's Rage
A game completed in a day for NUS GDG Game Jam!
Made by Tze Kin, Zhe Rui, Thaddeus

Game Description
King Arthur is on a rampage, swinging his sword everywhere without a care! You need to help him slash his enemies down!

How to Play
Move Arthur with WASD or the arrow keys. Aim the sword with the mouse. Every 2 seconds Arthur will swing his sword automatically.
The sword will get bigger and bigger as you kill more enemies.
Kill as many enemies as you can while avoiding slashing your wife!

Credits
Assets by analogStudios_
